div.p: RECEPTION is one of the three large buckets in the WRITING section of entries (in addition to TEXTUALFEATURES and PRODUCTION). RECEPTION charts the effects and results of an individual's writing, and the responses of self and others to individual texts or whole oeuvres. May contain one or more CHRONSTRUCTs about a particular review, comment, or consequence. Like TextualFeatures and Production, this element must be opened immediately after a DIV2. No text is allowed immediately within the RECEPTION element; another element (CHRONSTRUCT or SHORTPROSE) must be opened first. The multiple sub-elements conceptually attached to RECEPTION are prefaced by a small letter r, but you are free to use here any element prefaced by a p, r, or t as your prose demands.
